    • Uses of ColumnReference in adql.db

      Methods in adql.db with parameters of type ColumnReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DBColumn DBChecker.checkColumnReference(ColumnReference colRef, ClauseSelect select, SearchColumnList dbColumns)
      Check whether the given column reference corresponds to a selected item (column or an expression with an alias) or to an existing column.

    • Uses of ColumnReference in adql.parser

      Methods in adql.parser that return ColumnReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnReference ADQLParser.ColumnRef() 
      ColumnReference ADQLQueryFactory.createColRef(IdentifierItems.IdentifierItem idItem) 
      ColumnReference ADQLQueryFactory.createColRef(IdentifierItems idItems)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.4 ; Former version's mistake: a GROUP BY item is either a regular/delimited column name or an integer, not a qualified column name ; Replaced by ADQLQueryFactory.createColRef(adql.parser.IdentifierItems.IdentifierItem) ; This function is no longer used by ADQLParser.
      ColumnReference ADQLQueryFactory.createColRef(int index, TextPosition position) 

    • Uses of ColumnReference in adql.query

      Subclasses of ColumnReference in adql.query 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ADQLOrder
      Represents an item of the ORDER BY list: that's to say a column reference plus a sorting indication (ASC, DESC).
      Methods in adql.query that return types with arguments of type ColumnReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method parameters in adql.query with type arguments of type ColumnReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ADQLQuery.setGroupBy(ClauseADQL<ColumnReference> newGroupBy)
      Replaces its GROUP BY clause by the given one.
      Constructors in adql.query with parameters of type ColumnReference 
      Constructor and Description
      ColumnReference(ColumnReference toCopy)
      Builds a column reference by copying the given one.
